error.current: The date of birth must be in the past.
error.invalid: The date of birth must be valid in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD (Year-Month-Day).
error.required: The date of birth is required.

date-of-birth.help-message: Enter the birthdate of the person who the passport is for.
date-of-birth.label: Date of birth

error.valid: The email address must be valid.

email.help-message: Enter the email address you provided on your passport application form.

for-child.title: For child applications
for-child.help-message: For child applications, enter the email address of the applicant parent or legal guardian provided on the passport application.

email.label: Email address

email-confirmation-msg.dont-receive-header: If you did not receive an email
email-confirmation-msg.dont-receive: If you haven't received the email with your reference number:

dont-receive-list.item-2: if you think you may have entered different information than what was on your passport application, try again by clicking the button below

email-confirmation-msg.if-exists: Your request has been received. If we can find the file with the information you gave us, we'll email you the file number or reference number. If you don't receive the email in your inbox, check your junk folder.
email-confirmation-msg.may-take: It can take 5-10 business days for your application to appear in our system. Try again tomorrow - we update our system daily.
email-confirmation-msg.please-contact: Still haven't received the email with your reference number? <Link>Contact us</Link>.

request-received.will-email: We received your request for a reference number. If the information you provided matches our records, we'll email you within 30 minutes.
request-received.once-received: Once you receive the email, please continue by clicking the button below.

given-name.title: If the applicant has a single legal name
given-name.help-message: Enter first name(s) and any middle name(s) of the person who the passport is for. Make sure the information you enter matches your passport application.
given-name.label: Given name(s)

header-messages.matches: Make sure the information you enter matches your passport application.

one-name: Applicants with only one name (single or multiple names entered all in one field) must call us at 1‑800‑567‑6868 to get the status of their application.

surname.help-message: Enter last name of the person who the passport is for. Make sure the information you enter matches your passport application.
surname.label: Surname
